metadata.dc:description: Rhabdomyoma in adults is a rare benign tumor of the skeletal muscle that usually arises in the head and neck region. We report a new case of this rare tumor located in the tongue. The treatment, evolution, and anatomo-pathologic findings are described.
metadata.dc:title: Rabdomioma del adulto.
[Rhabdomyoma in the adult].
